import java.io.*;
import java.util.*;

class P1301
{
	public static int[][] arr;
	public static void main(String args[])
	throws IOException
	{
		BufferedReader br=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
		int n=Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());
		//int k=Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());
		int k=n*n;

		arr=new int[n][n];

		if(n%2==0)
			fill_even(0,n-1,0,n-1,k);
		else
			fill_odd(0,n-1,0,n-1,k);

		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
			{
				System.out.print(arr[i][j]+"\t");
			}
			System.out.print("\n");
		}	
	}

		public static void fill_even(int row_st,int row_end,int col_st,int col_end,int k)
		{
						
		
			//RIGHT Functionality
			for(int i=col_st;i<=col_end;i++)
				arr[row_st][i]=k--;

			row_st++;
					
			//DOWN Functionality
			for(int i=row_st;i<=row_end;i++)
				arr[i][col_end]=k--;

			col_end--;
					
			//LEFT Functionality
			for(int i=col_end;i>=col_st;i--)
				arr[row_end][i]=k--;

			row_end--;
						
			//UP Functionality
			for(int i=row_end;i>=row_st;i--)
				arr[i][col_st]=k--;

			col_st++;

			if(col_st<=col_end&&row_st<=row_end)
				fill_even(row_st,row_end,col_st,col_end,k);
			
		}

		public static void fill_odd(int row_st,int row_end,int col_st,int col_end,int k)
		{
						
		
			
			//LEFT Functionality
			for(int i=col_end;i>=col_st;i--)
				arr[row_end][i]=k--;

			row_end--;
						
			//UP Functionality
			for(int i=row_end;i>=row_st;i--)
				arr[i][col_st]=k--;

			col_st++;

			//RIGHT Functionality
			for(int i=col_st;i<=col_end;i++)
				arr[row_st][i]=k--;

			row_st++;
					
			//DOWN Functionality
			for(int i=row_st;i<=row_end;i++)
				arr[i][col_end]=k--;

			col_end--;
					
			if(col_st<=col_end&&row_st<=row_end)
				fill_odd(row_st,row_end,col_st,col_end,k);
			
		}




}
